55 
56 uint32_t log2Approx(uint32_t x)
57 {
58  uint32_t idx, detectFlag = 0;
59 
60  if ( x < 2)
61  {
62  return (0);
63  }
64 
65  idx = 32U;
66  while((detectFlag==0U) || (idx==0U))
67  {
68  if(x & 0x80000000U)
69  {
70  detectFlag = 1;
71  }
72  x <<= 1U;
73  idx--;
74  }
75 
76  if(x != 0)
77  {
78  idx = idx + 1;
79  }
80 
81  return(idx);
82 }
83 
84 void HWAutil_configRangeFFT(HWA_Handle handle,
85  uint32_t paramSetStartIdx,
86  uint32_t numAdcSamples,
87  uint32_t numRangeBins,
88  uint8_t numRxAnt,
89  uint32_t windowOffsetBytes,
90 
91  uint8_t dmaTriggerSourcePing,
92  uint8_t dmaTriggerSourcePong,
93 
94  uint8_t dmaDestChannelPing,
95  uint8_t dmaDestChannelPong,
96 
97  uint16_t hwaMemAdcBufOffset,
98 
99  uint16_t hwaMemDestPingOffset,
100  uint16_t hwaMemDestPongOffset,
101  uint8_t hwaTriggerMode)
102 {
103  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
104  int32_t errCode = 0;
105  uint32_t paramsetIdx = paramSetStartIdx;
106  uint32_t pingParamSetIdx = 0;
107  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg[HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D];
108 
109  memset(hwaParamCfg,0,sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
110 
111  /***********************/
112  /* PING DUMMY PARAMSET */
113  /***********************/
114  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA; //Software triggered - in demo this will be HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA
115  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSourcePing; //in demo this will be first EDMA Src channel id
116  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_NONE; //dummy
117  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle,paramsetIdx,&hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx],NULL);
118  if (errCode != 0)
119  {
120  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramsetIdx, errCode);
121  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
122  return;
123  }
124 
125  /***********************/
126  /* PING PROCESS PARAMSET */
127  /***********************/
128  paramsetIdx++;
129  pingParamSetIdx = paramsetIdx;
130  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = hwaTriggerMode;
131  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
132 
133  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = hwaMemAdcBufOffset; // address is relative to start of MEM0
134  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAcnt = numAdcSamples - 1; //this is samples - 1
135  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAIdx = numRxAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); // 16 bytes
136  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBcnt = numRxAnt-1; //no iterations here
137  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //should be dont care
138  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
139  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
140  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //complex data
141  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
142  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
143  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
144  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcScale = 8;
145  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
146  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
147 
148  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = hwaMemDestPingOffset; // address is relative to start of MEM0
149  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAcnt = numRangeBins-1; //this is samples - 1
150  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAIdx = numRxAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); //
151  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //should be dont care
152  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //same as input - complex
153  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
154  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
155  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
156  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstScale = 0;
157  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
158 
159  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
160  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(numRangeBins);
161  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant - revisit this for all FFT size and data size
162  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
163  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
164  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffsetBytes; //start of window RAM
165  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = 0; //non-symmetric - in demo do we make this symmetric
166  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0; //fftsize is less than 1K
167  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED; //disabled
168  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT; // output FFT samples
169 
170  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
171  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle,paramsetIdx,&hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx],NULL);
172  if (errCode != 0)
173  {
174  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n",errCode,paramsetIdx);
175  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
176  return;
177  }
178  /* enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
179  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
180  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaDestChannelPing; //TODO sync this define EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out
181  //paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = paramSetSem;//TODO check if NULL is required
182  errCode = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(handle,paramsetIdx,&paramISRConfig);
183  if (errCode != 0)
184  {
185  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(PING DMA) returned %d\n",errCode);
186  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
187  return;
188  }
189 
190  /***********************/
191  /* PONG DUMMY PARAMSET */
192  /***********************/
193  paramsetIdx++;
194  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
195  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSourcePong; //in demo this will be second EDMA Src channel id
196  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_NONE; //dummy
197  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle,paramsetIdx,&hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx],NULL);
198  if (errCode != 0)
199  {
200  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n",errCode,paramsetIdx);
201  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
202  return;
203  }
204 
205  /***********************/
206  /* PONG PROCESS PARAMSET */
207  /***********************/
208  paramsetIdx++;
209  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx] = hwaParamCfg[pingParamSetIdx];
210  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = hwaMemDestPongOffset;
211  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle,paramsetIdx,&hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx],NULL);
212  if (errCode != 0)
213  {
214  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n",errCode,paramsetIdx);
215  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
216  return;
217  }
218 
219  /* enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
220  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
221  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaDestChannelPong;
222  //paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = paramSetSem;//TODO check if NULL is required
223  errCode = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(handle,paramsetIdx,&paramISRConfig);
224  if (errCode != 0)
225  {
226  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(PING DMA) returned %d\n",errCode);
227  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
228  return;
229  }
230 }
231 
232 void HWAutil_configDopplerFFT
233 (
234  HWA_Handle handle,
235  uint32_t paramSetStartIdx,
236  uint32_t dopplerFftSize,
237  uint8_t numVirtualAnt,
238  uint32_t numRangeBinsPerIter,
239  uint32_t windowOffsetBytes,
240 
241  uint8_t dmaTriggerSourcePing,
242  uint8_t dmaTriggerSourcePong,
243 
244  uint8_t dmaDestChannelPing,
245  uint8_t dmaDestChannelPong,
246 
247  uint16_t hwaMemSourcePingOffset,
248  uint16_t hwaMemSourcePongOffset,
249 
250  uint16_t hwaMemDestPingOffset,
251  uint16_t hwaMemDestPongOffset,
252  uint32_t option
253 )
254 {
255  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg[HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_2D];
256  uint32_t paramsetIdx = 0;
257  int32_t errCode = 0;
258  uint32_t k;
259  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
260  uint32_t numDopplerBins = dopplerFftSize;
261 
262  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
263 
264  //Doppler FFT
265  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA; //Immediate following first - in demo this should be HWA_TRIG_MODE_DFE
266  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSourcePing; //Immediate following first - in demo this should be HWA_TRIG_MODE_DFE
267  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
268 
269  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = hwaMemSourcePingOffset; // address is relative to start of MEM0
270  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAcnt = dopplerFftSize - 1; //size in samples - 1
271 
272  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); //
273  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBcnt = numVirtualAnt - 1; //no iterations here
274  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //should be dont care
275  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
276  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
277  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcRealComplex = 0; //complex data
278  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
279  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
280  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
281  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcScale = 0;
282  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
283  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
284 
285  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = hwaMemDestPingOffset; // address is relative to start of MEM0
286  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAcnt = dopplerFftSize - 1; //this is samples - 1
287  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); // 16 bytes
288  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //should be dont care
289  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstRealComplex = 0; //same as input - complex
290  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
291  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
292  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
293  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstScale = 8;
294  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
295 
296  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
297  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(dopplerFftSize);
298 
299  /* scaling is enabled in all stages except in the first one because of the
300  * Hanning window scaling by half */
301  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = (dopplerFftSize - 1) >> 1;
302 
303  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
304  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
305  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffsetBytes; //start of window RAM
306  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = 1; //non-symmetric - in demo do we make this symmetric
307  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0; //fftsize is less than 1K
308 
309  if(option == (uint32_t)DATA_PATH_CHAIN_SEPARATE_LOGMAG)
310  {
311  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
312  }
313  else
314  {
315  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_ENABLED;
316  }
317 
318  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
319 
320  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
321  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], NULL);
322  if (errCode != 0)
323  {
324  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, errCode);
325  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
326  return;
327  }
328 
329  //Doppler FFT
330  for (paramsetIdx = 1; paramsetIdx < numRangeBinsPerIter; paramsetIdx++)
331  {
332  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx] = hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx-1];
333  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr += sizeof(uint32_t) * numVirtualAnt * dopplerFftSize;
334  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr += sizeof(uint32_t) * numVirtualAnt * dopplerFftSize;
335  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
336 
337  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], NULL);
338  if (errCode != 0)
339  {
340  //System_printf("Error: Doppler FFT: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, errCode);
341  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
342  return;
343  }
344  }
345 
346  //log2 magnitude
347  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
348  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE; //Immediate following first - in demo this should be HWA_TRIG_MODE_DFE
349  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
350 
351  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = hwaMemDestPingOffset; // address is relative to start of MEM0
352  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAcnt = numDopplerBins * numVirtualAnt * numRangeBinsPerIter - 1; //size in samples - 1
353  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //
354  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBcnt = 0; //no iterations here
355  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBIdx = 0; //should be dont care
356  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
357  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
358  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcRealComplex = 0; //complex data
359  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
360  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
361  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
362  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcScale = 0;
363  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
364  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
365 
366  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = hwaMemSourcePingOffset; // address is relative to start of MEM0
367  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAcnt = numDopplerBins * numVirtualAnt * numRangeBinsPerIter - 1; //this is samples - 1
368  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t); // 2 bytes
369  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstBIdx = 0; //should be dont care
370  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstRealComplex = 1; //same as input - complex
371  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
372  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED; //same as input - signed
373  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
374  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstScale = 0;
375  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
376 
377  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 0;
378  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = 1;//TODO remove later after driver corrects
379  if(option == (uint32_t)DATA_PATH_CHAIN_SEPARATE_LOGMAG)
380  {
381  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_ENABLED;
382  }
383  else
384  {
385  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
386  }
387 
388  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], NULL);
389  if (errCode != 0)
390  {
391  //System_printf("Error: Log2 HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d \n", paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, errCode);
392  //System_printf("numDopplerBins %d numVirtualAnt %d numRangeBinsPerIter %d\n", numDopplerBins,numVirtualAnt, numRangeBinsPerIter);
393  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
394  return;
395  }
396 
397  paramsetIdx++;
398  //Sum of magnitudes
399  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
400  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE; //Immediate
401  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
402 
403  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr = hwaMemSourcePingOffset; // address is relative to start of MEM0
404  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAnt-1; //size in samples - 1
405 
406  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t); //
407  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBcnt = numDopplerBins * numRangeBinsPerIter - 1; //no iterations here
408  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcBIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(uint16_t); //should be dont care
409  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
410  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
411  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcRealComplex = 1; //real data
412  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
413  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED; //signed
414  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
415  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcScale = 2;
416  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
417  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
418 
419  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) (hwaMemDestPingOffset + numDopplerBins *
420  numVirtualAnt * numRangeBinsPerIter * sizeof(uint32_t)); // address is relative to start of MEM0
421 
422  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAcnt = 1 - 1; //this is samples - 1
423  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t); // 16 bytes
424  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint16_t); //should be dont care
425  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstRealComplex = 1; //same as input - complex
426  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
427  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED; //same as input - signed
428  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
429  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstScale = 8;
430  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
431 
432  if(numVirtualAnt == 1)
433  {
434  /*If number of virtual antennas is 1, do not use FFT to compute sum magnitude.
435  There is nothing to sum and azimuth can not be estimated.*/
436  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 0;
437  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = 1;
438  }
439  else
440  {
441  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
442  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(numVirtualAnt);
443  }
444  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant - revisit this for all FFT size and data size
445  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
446  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0; //enabled
447  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = 0; //start of window RAM
448  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = 1; //non-symmetric - in demo do we make this symmetric
449  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0; //fftsize is less than 1K
450  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED; //disabled
451  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT; // output FFT samples
452 
453  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
454  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], NULL);
455  if (errCode != 0)
456  {
457  //System_printf("Error: Sum of mag HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, errCode);
458  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
459  return;
460  }
461  /* Enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
462  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
463  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaDestChannelPing; //EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out
464  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
465  errCode = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(handle, paramSetStartIdx+paramsetIdx, &paramISRConfig);
466  if (errCode != 0)
467  {
468  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(PING DMA) returned %d\n",errCode);
469  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
470  return;
471  }
472 
473 
474  //programming HWACC for the pong buffer
475  for (k=0; k < numRangeBinsPerIter + 2; k++)
476  {
477  paramsetIdx = k + numRangeBinsPerIter + 2;
478  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx] = hwaParamCfg[k];
479  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].source.srcAddr += (hwaMemSourcePongOffset - hwaMemSourcePingOffset);
480  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dest.dstAddr += (hwaMemDestPongOffset - hwaMemDestPingOffset);//#def??
481 
482  if (k == 0)
483  {
484  hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx].dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSourcePong;
485  }
486 
487 
488  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx, &hwaParamCfg[paramsetIdx], NULL);
489  if (errCode != 0)
490  {
491  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx + paramsetIdx, errCode);
492  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
493  return;
494  }
495  }
496 
497  /* Enable the DMA hookup to the last paramset */
498  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
499  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaDestChannelPong; //EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out
500  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
501  errCode = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(handle, paramSetStartIdx + 2*(numRangeBinsPerIter+2)-1, &paramISRConfig);
502  if (errCode != 0)
503  {
504  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(PONG DMA) returned %d\n",errCode);
505  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
506  return;
507  }
508 
509  /***********************/
510  /* CONFIG WINDOW RAM */
511  /***********************/
512  /* if windowing is enabled, load the window coefficients in RAM */
513  //errCode = HWA_configRam(handle, HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM, (uint8_t *)win_data16, sizeof(win_data16), windowOffsetBytes);
514 
515  }
516 
517 void HWAutil_configDopplerFFTSingleRangeBin(HWA_Handle handle,
518  uint32_t paramSetStartIdx,
519  uint32_t dopplerFftSize,
520  uint8_t numVirtualAnt,
521  uint32_t windowOffsetBytes,
522  uint8_t dmaTriggerSource,
523  uint16_t hwaMemAzimSource,
524  uint16_t hwaMemAzimDest)
525 {
526  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
527  int32_t errCode = 0;
528 
529  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
530 
531  //Doppler FFT
532  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA; //HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE; //Immediate following first - in demo this should be HWA_TRIG_MODE_DFE
533  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSource; //0; //Immediate following first - in demo this should be HWA_TRIG_MODE_DFE
534  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
535 
536  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaMemAzimSource; // address is relative to start of MEM0
537  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = dopplerFftSize - 1; //size in samples - 1
538 
539  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); //
540  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numVirtualAnt -1; //no iterations here
541  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //should be dont care
542  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
543  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
544  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //complex data
545  hwaParamCfg.source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
546  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
547  hwaParamCfg.source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
548  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
549  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
550  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
551 
552  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaMemAzimDest; // address is relative to start of MEM0
553  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = dopplerFftSize - 1; //this is samples - 1
554  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); //
555  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t) ; //should be dont care
556  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //same as input - complex
557  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
558  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
559  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
560  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8 ;
561  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
562 
563  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
564  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(dopplerFftSize);
565  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant - revisit this for all FFT size and data size
566  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
567  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
568  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffsetBytes; //start of window RAM
569  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = 1; //non-symmetric - in demo do we make this symmetric
570  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0; //fftsize is less than 1K
571  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;//HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED; //disabled
572  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT; // output FFT samples
573 
574  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
575  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
576  if (errCode != 0)
577  {
578  //retCode = HWA_TEST_ERROR;
579  System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx, errCode);
580  return;
581  }
582 
583  }
584 
585 void HWAutil_configCFAR(HWA_Handle handle,
586  uint32_t paramSetStartIdx,
587  uint32_t numRangeBins,
588  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
589  uint32_t winLen,
590  uint32_t guardLen,
591  uint32_t noiseDivRightShift,
592  uint8_t peakGrouping,
593  uint8_t cyclicMode,
594  uint8_t nAvgMode,
595  uint16_t detObjectListSize,
596  uint8_t dmaTriggerSource,
597  uint8_t dmaDestChannel,
598  uint16_t hwaSourceBufOffset,
599  uint16_t hwaDestBufOffset
600  )
601 {
602  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
603  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
604  int32_t errCode = 0;
605 
606 
607  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
608  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
609  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSource;
610 
611  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.peakGroupEn = peakGrouping;
612  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_CFAR;
613 
614  //cfarInpMode = 1, cfarLogMode = 1, cfarAbsMode = 00b
615  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.operMode = HWA_CFAR_OPER_MODE_LOG_INPUT_REAL;
616 
617 
618  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaSourceBufOffset;
619  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numRangeBins-1;
620  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_REAL;
621  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numDopplerBins*2;
622  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
623  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numDopplerBins-1;
624  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
625 
626  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaDestBufOffset;
627  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = detObjectListSize - 1;
628  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX;
629  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_32BIT;
630  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = 8;
631  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = 4096;
632  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8;
633 
634  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numGuardCells = guardLen;
635  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.nAvgDivFactor = noiseDivRightShift;
636  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.cyclicModeEn = cyclicMode;
637  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.nAvgMode = nAvgMode;
638  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numNoiseSamplesRight = winLen >> 1;
639  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numNoiseSamplesLeft = winLen >> 1;
640  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.outputMode = HWA_CFAR_OUTPUT_MODE_I_PEAK_IDX_Q_NEIGHBOR_NOISE_VAL;
641 
642  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
643  if (errCode != 0)
644  {
645  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx, errCode);
646  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
647  return;
648  }
649 
650  /* Enable the DMA hookup to the last paramset */
651  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
652  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaDestChannel; //EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out
653  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
654  errCode = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(handle, paramSetStartIdx, &paramISRConfig);
655  if (errCode != 0)
656  {
657  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(PONG DMA) returned %d\n",errCode);
658  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
659  return;
660  }
661 
662 }
663 
664 void HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuth(HWA_Handle handle,
665  uint32_t paramSetStartIdx,
666  uint32_t numVirtualAnt,
667  uint32_t fftOutSize,
668  uint32_t numIter,
669  uint16_t hwaSourceBufOffset,
670  uint16_t hwaDestBufOffset)
671 {
672  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
673  int32_t errCode = 0;
674 
675  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
676  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
677 
678  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaSourceBufOffset;
679  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAnt-1;
680  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
681  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(uint32_t);
682  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
683  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
684  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
685 
686 
687  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
688  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
689  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED;
690  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
691  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
692  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = 1;
693  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = 512; //do not care
694  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
695 
696  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaDestBufOffset;
697  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
698  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);//abs
699  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint16_t);
700  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
701  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
702  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_REAL;
703 
704  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
705  if (errCode != 0)
706  {
707  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx, errCode);
708  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
709  return;
710  }
711 
712 }

714 void HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuthElevation(HWA_Handle handle,
715  uint32_t paramSetStartIdx,
716  uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim,
717  uint32_t numVirtualAntElev,
718  uint32_t fftOutSize,
719  uint32_t numIter,
720  uint16_t hwaSourceAzimBufOffset,
721  uint32_t hwaSourceElevBufOffset,
722  uint16_t hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffset,
723  uint16_t hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffset,
724  uint16_t hwaDestElevCplxBufOffset)
725 {
726  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
727  int32_t errCode = 0;
728 
729  /**************First Param set computes the complex values of the elevation-FFT **********/
730  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
731  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
732 
733  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaSourceElevBufOffset;
734  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntElev-1;
735  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
736  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numVirtualAntElev * sizeof(uint32_t);
737  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
738  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
739  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
740 
741 
742  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
743  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
744  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
745  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
746  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
747 
748  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaDestElevCplxBufOffset;
749  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
750  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
751  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint32_t);
752  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
753  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
754 
755  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
756  if (errCode != 0)
757  {
758  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx, errCode);
759  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
760  return;
761  }
762 
763  /**************Second Param set computes the absolute values of the azimuth-FFT **********/
764  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
765  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
766 
767  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaSourceAzimBufOffset;
768  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntAzim-1;
769  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
770  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
771  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
772  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
773  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
774 
775  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
776  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
777  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED;
778  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
779  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
780  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
781 
782  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffset;
783  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
784  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);//abs
785  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint16_t);
786  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
787  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
788  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_REAL;
789 
790  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx + 1, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
791  if (errCode != 0)
792  {
793  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx + 1, errCode);
794  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
795  return;
796  }
797 
798  /**************Third Param set computes the complex values of the azimuth-FFT **********/
799  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
800  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
801 
802  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaSourceAzimBufOffset;
803  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntAzim-1;
804  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
805  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
806  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
807  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
808  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
809 
810 
811  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
812  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
813  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = log2Approx(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
814  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
815  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
816 
817  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffset;
818  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
819  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
820  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint32_t);
821  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
822  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
823 
824  errCode = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx + 2, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
825  if (errCode != 0)
826  {
827  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configParamSet(%d) returned %d\n", paramSetStartIdx + 2, errCode);
828  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
829  return;
830  }
831 }
